attributes.action: STOP STRETFORD HIGH SCHOOL MERGE WITH LOSTOCK COLLEGE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A new academy is set to be built in old trafford.We dont disagree with the academy to be built but disagree to the two schools merging until the academy is built.pupils wil have to travel to both schools.The school wasnt the parents choice!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with your local authority.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
